title: Budget 2026: Check what gets cheaper and costlier in Union Budget this year
desc: Union Budget 2026 Cheaper Costlier List: Several items will become cheaper due to duty cuts. These include overseas tourism packages and energy transition equipment. However, penalties for income tax misreporting have increased. Securities Transaction Tax on stock options also saw a rise. This budget aims to boost growth and household sentiment.
